modShortDescription: Adds a craftable beehive which generates 1-5 honey every 2-3 in-game days. Unlocked via the Living off the Land perk (level 1). Placeable anywhere.
modDescription:
Adds a craftable beehive which generates 1-5 honey every 2-3 in-game days.

* Unlocked via the Living off the Land perk (level 1)
* Placeable anywhere

**Important:** Needs to be installed on both the server and client sides, due to custom icon(s)/assets.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JQLeA_ZcT9oVfGNg1fHmPotsCx66EVGm/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20806-freakuks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [FreakUK](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/freakuk/)
